renderedFields.description:
Description:
Application URL: http://smarttasks-env.eba-ep3hvh25.us-east-1.elasticbeanstalk.com/login

 

Steps:

  1. Navigate to http://smarttasks-env.eba-ep3hvh25.us-east-1.elasticbeanstalk.com/login
  2. Enter Email Address: user1@gmail.com
  3. Enter password: Welcome!
  4. Click "Sign in" button (CSS: #login-btn)
  5. In All Tasks tab, Click on complete button of task “The Action Crew”
  6. Click on the Completed tab right next to All Tasks tab
  7. Verify task “The Action Crew” marked as completed is visible in Completed tab as well

Expected: The Action Crew task must be shown in the Completed Tab
Actual: The Action Crew task is not shown in the Completed Tab

content.text: In All Tasks tab, Click on complete button of task “The Action Crew”
Click on the Completed tab right next to All Tasks tab
Verify task “The Action Crew” marked as completed  is visible in Completed tab as well
Expected: The Action Crew task must be shown in the Completed Tab
Actual: The Action Crew task is not shown in the Completed Tab

fields.summary: Pending tasks are not shown in pending tasks tab

parsed_issue.summary: Pending tasks are not shown in pending tasks tab
parsed_issue.description:
Description: 
 Application URL:    Steps: • Navigate to  
 • Enter Email Address:  • user1@gmail.com 
 • Enter password: Welcome! 
 • Click "Sign in" button (CSS: #login-btn) 
 • In All Tasks tab, Click on complete button of task “The Action Crew” 
 • Click on the Completed tab right next to All Tasks tab 
 • Verify task “The Action Crew” marked as completed  is visible in Completed tab as well 
 Expected: The Action Crew task must be shown in the Completed Tab 
 Actual: The Action Crew task is not shown in the Completed Tab
reproduction_steps: Step 2: Enter 'user1@gmail.com' in the Email Address field
Step 3: Enter 'Welcome!' in the password field
Step 4: Click on the 'Sign in' button (CSS: #login-btn)
Step 5: In the 'All Tasks' tab, click on the 'complete' button of the task 'The Action Crew'
Step 6: Click on the 'Completed' tab right next to the 'All Tasks' tab
Step 7: Verify that the task 'The Action Crew' marked as completed is visible in the 'Completed' tab
parsed_issue.expected_behavior: The task 'The Action Crew' must be shown in the 'Completed' tab after marking it as completed.
parsed_issue.actual_behavior: The task 'The Action Crew' is not shown in the 'Completed' tab after marking it as completed.

executed_steps.description: Wait for page to load after login
Click on the 'complete' button of the task 'The Action Crew'
executed_steps.target: complete button for task 'The Action Crew'
executed_steps.actual_result: Clicked 'complete button for task 'The Action Crew'' successfully

executed_steps.description: Click on the 'Completed' tab right next to the 'All Tasks' tab
Wait for dynamic content to load
Verify that the task 'The Action Crew' marked as completed is visible in the 'Completed' tab
executed_steps.target: task 'The Action Crew' in Completed tab
executed_steps.actual_result: Element 'task 'The Action Crew' in Completed tab' found. Content: Add New Task

reproduction_result.root_cause_analysis: The bug was reproduced because the task 'The Action Crew' was expected to be shown in the 'Completed' tab after marking it as completed. However, the verification step indicated that the content found was 'Add New Task' instead of the expected task. This suggests that either the task was not correctly moved to the 'Completed' tab or there was an issue in displaying the correct content within that tab.
recommendations: Verify the backend logic to ensure that tasks are correctly marked as completed and moved to the 'Completed' tab.
Check the frontend code to ensure that the 'Completed' tab is correctly fetching and displaying the completed tasks.

The bug was reproduced because the task 'The Action Crew' was expected to be shown in the 'Completed' tab after marking it as completed. However, the verification step indicated that the content found was 'Add New Task' instead of the expected task. This suggests that either the task was not correctly moved to the 'Completed' tab or there was an issue in displaying the correct content within that tab.
1. Verify the backend logic to ensure that tasks are correctly marked as completed and moved to the 'Completed' tab.
2. Check the frontend code to ensure that the 'Completed' tab is correctly fetching and displaying the completed tasks.

The bug was reproduced because the task 'The Action Crew' was expected to be shown in the 'Completed' tab after marking it as completed. However, the verification step indicated that the content found was 'Add New Task' instead of the expected task. This suggests that either the task was not correctly moved to the 'Completed' tab or there was an issue in displaying the correct content within that tab.
1. Verify the backend logic to ensure that tasks are correctly marked as completed and moved to the 'Completed' tab.
2. Check the frontend code to ensure that the 'Completed' tab is correctly fetching and displaying the completed tasks.

The bug was reproduced because the task 'The Action Crew' was expected to be shown in the 'Completed' tab after marking it as completed. However, the verification step indicated that the content found was 'Add New Task' instead of the expected task. This suggests that either the task was not correctly moved to the 'Completed' tab or there was an issue in displaying the correct content within that tab.
1. Verify the backend logic to ensure that tasks are correctly marked as completed and moved to the 'Completed' tab.
2. Check the frontend code to ensure that the 'Completed' tab is correctly fetching and displaying the completed tasks.
